title: Edge of Tomorty: Rick Die Rickpeat
synop: Rick brings Morty to a planet containing crystals that show whoever is touching them all the ways they may die depending on their choices.

title: The Old Man and the Seat
synop: Rick goes to his private bathroom to find that someone else has used it. Jerry creates an app with an unlikely alien and Morty pays the price.

title: One Crew over the Crewcoo's Morty
synop: On a treasure-seeking expedition in an alien temple, Rick and Morty discover that a heist expert has snatched the prize from under their noses. Further twists, turns and double-crosses abound.

title: Claw and Hoarder: Special Ricktim's Morty
synop: Morty asks Rick for a dragon and Rick finds a wizard of another dimension who makes a soul bonding contract between Morty and a dragon called Balthromaw. Meanwhile, Jerry meets a talking cat in his bedroom who wants to fly to Florida.

title: Rattlestar Ricklactica
synop: Morty discovers a race of intelligent space snakes after suffering a potentially lethal bite. Jerry attempts to prove that he isn't completely incompetent.

title: Never Ricking Morty
synop: An anthology episode that follows Rick and Morty on a train with people who don't like Rick. They have to find their way out but they bump into unexpected situations along the way.

title: Promortyus
synop: Rick, Morty and Summer visit an alien civilisation, where Rick and Morty are controlled by parasites and Summer lives a luxurious lifestyle.

title: The Vat of Acid Episode
synop: Rick & Morty go on a simple exchange as Rick tells Morty if something goes wrong jump into the same vat of acid as he does.

title: Childrick of Mort
synop: Rick, Morty, Beth, Summer and Jerry share a galactic adventure.

title: Star Mort Rickturn of the Jerri
synop: An adventure with an invisibility belt, but a family that disappears together, must stay together.
